mapper.select: SELECT CC.NO AS CLASS_COMM_NO ,CCA.NAME AS CATE_NO ,M.NAME AS WRITER ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,ANSWER_YN ,CC.REPORT_YN AS REPORT_YN ,HIT ,CC.ENROLL_DATE AS ENROLL_DATE FROM CLASS_COMM CC JOIN COMM_CATE CCA ON CC.CATE_NO = CCA.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON CC.WRITER = M.NO WHERE CC.CATE_NO = 1 ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC

SELECT CC.NO AS CLASS_COMM_NO , CCA.NAME AS CATE_NO , M.NO AS WRITER_NO ,M.NAME AS WRITER ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,ANSWER_YN ,CC.REPORT_YN AS REPORT_YN ,HIT ,CC.ENROLL_DATE AS ENROLL_DATE FROM CLASS_COMM CC JOIN COMM_CATE CCA ON CC.CATE_NO = CCA.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON CC.WRITER = M.NO WHERE CC.NO = ${classCommNo}

SELECT CC.NO CLASS_COMM_NO ,CCA.NAME CATE_NO ,M.NAME WRITER ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,ANSWER_YN ,CC.REPORT_YN REPORT_YN ,HIT ,CC.ENROLL_DATE ENROLL_DATE FROM CLASS_COMM CC JOIN COMM_CATE CCA ON CC.CATE_NO = CCA.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON CC.WRITER = M.NO WHERE CC.CATE_NO = 2 ORDER BY ${orderBy}

SELECT CC.NO CLASS_COMM_NO ,CCA.NAME CATE_NO ,M.NAME WRITER ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,ANSWER_YN ,CC.REPORT_YN REPORT_YN ,HIT ,CC.ENROLL_DATE ENROLL_DATE FROM CLASS_COMM CC JOIN COMM_CATE CCA ON CC.CATE_NO = CCA.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON CC.WRITER = M.NO WHERE CC.CATE_NO = 3 ORDER BY ${orderBy}

SELECT CMC.NO COM_COMMENT_NO ,CMC.COMM_NO COM_CLASS_COMM_NO ,CMC.WRITER COM_WRITER_NO ,CMC.CONTENT COM_CONTENT ,TO_CHAR(CMC.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') COM_ENROLL_DATE ,M.NICK COM_WRITER FROM COMM_COMMENT CMC JOIN MEMBER M ON CMC.WRITER = M.NO WHERE CMC.COMM_NO = ${comCommentNo}

SELECT CMC.NO COM_COMMENT_NO ,CMC.COMM_NO COM_CLASS_COMM_NO ,CMC.WRITER COM_WRITER_NO ,CMC.CONTENT COM_CONTENT ,TO_CHAR(CMC.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') COM_ENROLL_DATE ,M.NICK COM_WRITER FROM COMM_COMMENT CMC JOIN MEMBER M ON CMC.WRITER = M.NO WHERE ROWNUM = 1 AND CMC.WRITER = ${comWriterNo} AND CMC.COMM_NO = ${comCommentNo} ORDER BY CMC.ENROLL_DATE
